actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide special "quarters of coverage" requirements for participation in the Social Security system by handicapped persons.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to define "quarter of coverage" for purposes of qualifying a handicapped individual for social security benefits as a quarter in which such handicapped individual has been paid $50 or more in wages or has been credited with $100 or more of self-employment income while working in a facility which provides remunerative work for the handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide special "quarters of coverage" requirements for participation in the Social Security system by handicapped persons.
